ComicInfo.Title: Like Lambs to the...
ComicInfo.Penciller: Chris Wozniak,Jim Valentino,Brad Foster,Jim Valentino,Brad Foster
ComicInfo.Summary: Like Lambs to the...: The police have hired a bounty hunter to come in and capture Shadowhawk but their intel is bad and Slaughter goes after Paul's friend, Christina. When the real Shadowhawk shows up, Slaughter gets the drop on him but decides to let him go because he approves of the hero's brutal treatment of criminals.
ComicInfo.Colorist: Frank Lopez,Rob Schwager,Todd Broeker,Frank Lopez,Rob Schwager,Todd Broeker
